title: Is hanging clothes in bathroom not permissible due 2 negative energy & Jinn presence Assim al hakeem
transcript: yaser says I heard somewhere that hanging clothes in the toilet is not permissible due to negative energy and Jin being inhabiting such places is this true seriously negative energy what is this so if you hang your clothes outside in your uh gym for example or in your study would that mean that you will have positive energy all of this is nonsense we have nothing relating to such nonsense in Islam it is no problem none whatsoever in hanging your clothes in the toilet at all
